openGraph.title: Ladder Draw
openGraph.description: A simple ladder draw tool that randomly matches participants with outcomes. Use it for everyday raffles, team assignments, and event picks.

title: Ladder Draw
description: Enter participants and outcomes to get a random match.

participants.label: Participants
participants.placeholder: Enter names with new lines or commas
participants.helper: Example: Alex, Jamie or one name per line

results.label: Outcomes
results.placeholder: Enter prizes/roles with new lines or commas

notice: If there are fewer outcomes than participants, we'll fill the rest automatically.
empty: Enter participants and outcomes, then run the draw.

error.noParticipants: Please enter at least one participant.
